roleDescription: Leads the company's R&D team and product improvement efforts, focusing on developing new products and enhancing existing ones to match market trends and needs. This role combines scientific knowledge with business acumen to ensure innovative outcomes that maintain the company's competitive edge and profitability.
dailyTasks: Improving current products using creative skills and research.
Developing new products aligned with industry trends.
Identifying technical issues in product evaluation.
Managing tests and trials for process and product effectiveness.
Overseeing the R&D team and ensuring adherence to policies.
Budgeting and forecasting for new research plans.
Attending conferences and presenting research findings.
Collaborating with market research companies for product success.
responsibilities: Direct and implement R&D policies, objectives, and initiatives.
Ensure R&D activities maintain competitive position and profitability.
Lead and manage an R&D team, providing guidance and support.
Conduct risk assessments and manage R&D budgets.
Collaborate with other departments for product development and market success.
Stay updated with industry trends and technologies.
qualifications: Advanced degree in a relevant field such as Organic Chemistry.
5+ years of leadership experience in R&D.
Experience in product development in industrial or commercial sectors.
Proven track record in intellectual property management.
skills: Strong leadership and team management abilities.
In-depth knowledge of R&D principles and best practices.
Proficiency in data analysis and forecasting models.
Experience with budget management and strategic planning.
Knowledge of regulatory requirements and industry standards.
